statements.statements: if (calc.risk in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(calc.risk in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (new.category in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(new.category in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (phase.sel in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(phase.sel in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (cpyopn in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(cpyopn in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (open in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(open in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (reopen in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(reopen in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (update in $G.cm3r.environment~="never" and not (null(update in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (close in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(close in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (exists("tableAccess", $G.cm3r.environment) and not (null($G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.folders=denull(folders in tableAccess in $G.cm3r.environment))

if (nullsub($G.folderEntitlement, false) and lng($L.folders)>0) then for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.folders) do (if (2 in $L.i in $L.folders or 4 in $L.i in $L.folders or 5 in $L.i in $L.folders~="never") then ($L.update.capability=true))
if (closed.update in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(closed.update in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (approvals in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(approvals in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (approve.override in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(approve.override in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (approve.mass in $G.cm3r.environment~=false and not (null(approve.mass in $G.cm3r.environment))) then ($L.update.capability=true)
